Today, Gower is lighting up with a solid 4 ft @ 9s WSW swell and light 9 mph S winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are prime spots, both working well throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 3 ft @ 11s with light 5 mph WNW winds, still offering fun conditions at various beaches. By the day after, conditions remain good at 4 ft @ 8s, with a gentle 7 mph SSE breeze, making for a great surf day. Best: today.
